page.title: 20EDUCATION
page.content: The Dartington area is blessed with a wide range of educational facilities. The primary school has over 200 children in it. It was built in 1855. It has a Nursery unit on a seperate site. Dartington Hall school is a boarding and day school.There is less emphasis on exams than in other schools,and more on Arts and Crafts,Sport and self reliance.The College of Arts runs courses in art,music,dance and drama. The Devon Centre is a place where teachers go on courses to learn all sorts of things such as about computers. King Edward 1V Community College is a comprehensive school and adult college Dartington also has an adult study centre,a private technical college,a school of self sufficiency,and regular conferences on educational themes.
